verses.name: Leviticus 19:23
verses.text: And when ye shall come into the land, and shall have planted all manner of trees for food, then ye shall count the fruit thereof as uncircumcised: three years shall it be as uncircumcised unto you: it shall not be eaten of.

verses.name: Leviticus 19:24
verses.text: But in the fourth year all the fruit thereof shall be holy to praise the Lord withal.

verses.name: Leviticus 19:25
verses.text: And in the fifth year shall ye eat of the fruit thereof, that it may yield unto you the increase thereof: I am the Lord your God.
